references: Related: CF 205366, CF 206002, CF 205531. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 5, 6 and north 15 feet of Lot 7, Block A, Sea Shore Addition to Alki Point; that portion of the north 2 1/2 acres of the northeast quarter of the northeast quarter of the southeast quarter of Section 4-25-4 being known as Lot 50, High-Hurst on the Hill Addition (Unrecorded): and the east 49 feet of Lot 12, Block 6, McLaughlin's Lawn Acres Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-261 and 17-208, respectively.
